title: Pasta with tomato and chilli sauce

default: 150g/5½oz penne pasta, cooked according to packet instructions

steps: Place a frying pan over a medium heat. Add the olive oil, red onion and garlic and cook for five minutes, until the onion has softened.
Add the tomatoes and chilli flakes and continue to cook for five more minutes.
To serve, place the pasta in a bowl and pour over the tomato sauce.
